item.title: Super Singer Junior 2023
item.description: The Audition registration is free, however we welcome your donations. Your donations are tax-deductible. Donations could be made through the below PAYPAL link. Thank you for your continuous support to YOUR Murugan Temple Donation Amount: $ Checkout With PayPal -- Watch Arohara vol 3 Live Concert On YouTube Here (make sure to bookmark this for quick access on the day of event) -- Please Register using the following link Click Here jQuery(document).

item.title: Navarathiri
item.description: At Murugan Temple, you can make a donation towards one or more of the following projects. All contributions/donations are fully tax deductable. Please add the items to the cart and then check-out the cart when you're ready to proceed to the payment screen. Thank you.
